name: A. Music
statement:
Little Lesha loves listening to music via his smartphone. But the
smartphone doesn’t have much memory, so Lesha listens to his favorite
songs in a well-known social network InTalk.Unfortunately, internet is
not that fast in the city of Ekaterinozavodsk and the song takes a lot
of time to download. But Lesha is quite impatient. The song’s duration
is seconds. Lesha downloads the first seconds of the song and plays it.
When the playback reaches the point that has not yet been downloaded,
Lesha immediately plays the song from the start (the loaded part of the
song stays in his phone, and the download is continued from the same
place), and it happens until the song is downloaded completely and Lesha
listens to it to the end. For seconds of real time the Internet allows
you to download seconds of the track.Tell Lesha, for how many times he
will start the song, including the very first start.
